metadata.Title: CVE-2022-46663 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In GNU Less before 609, crafted data can result in "less -R" not filtering ANSI escape sequences sent to the terminal.

notes.Note: alexmurray> affects less versions 566 and later (original bug was introduced in commit 0f810ef16781bf0f59690be63af876bddabf68bf)

criterions.comment: less: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
